titles.title: To consent to certain amendments enacted by the Legislature of the State of Hawaii to the Hawaiian Homes Commission Act, 1920.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-16.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 12.

action.text: Mr. Doolittle moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

At the conclusion of debate, the Chair put the question 7 on the motion to suspend the rules and announced that, by voice vote, the measure was agreed to. Ms. Sanchez demanded the yeas and nays on agreeing to the resolution, which was supported by 1/5 of the Members present and the yeas and nays were ordered. Pursuant to clause 5, rule I, the Speaker announced that the vote would be postponed until later in the day.

Ms. Sanchez asked unanimous consent to vacate the previous proceedings ordering the Yeas and Nays on the resolution. Without objection, the proceedings were vacated. The Chair announced that the question would be put de novo on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution at the conclusion of debate on all motions to suspensions.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 105-19.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 54.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/21/1997--Introduced. States that the United States consents to certain amendments adopted by Hawaii to the Hawaiian Homes Commission Act, 1920.
